item.title: Introducing fmlr
item.description: not compare For one, I think this shows that I’ve been thinking about this for a long time. And the approach here may seem very strange, but it’s for a good reason. And two, this approach isn’t really “better” or “worse” than another. It comes with advantages and disadvantages. Philosophy and Similar Projects Some similar C/C++ projects worth mentioning: Armadillo Eigen Boost PETSc GSL Some similar R projects worth mentioning:
